Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, between the park and the Crimson Dragon Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The posh Crimson Dragon Traveler's Lodge on the south side of the road is a very popular lodging place for visitors to Oceancrest. Its luxurious accomodations are not without a price, though. On the north side of the road is the Wakarimasu Park, an elegant park based on ancient oriental architectures.
